entries.meaning: (uncountable) Absence of a signature; failure to sign.
examples: Despite several decisions on nonsignature, the court cases on this subject deal only with unanimous awards.

entries.meaning: (countable) That which is not a signature.
examples: But there are many cases where a signature is made that is actually a nonsignature. The bad-check files are full of signatures of “Ima Thief,” “U. R. Had,” and “George Q. Washington,” etc.
